title: Seeing how much league of legends has changed makes me wanna cry

replies.body: I know right? Seeing those old models makes my eyes hurt.
It's even funnier to think the second model was supposed to be dr mundo.
REALLY?! Looks all the world like singed...
How does it look like singed? Every feature of it screams 'crazy doctor'. I guess it's just hard to imagine Mundo without his tongue hanging out of his mouth.
hE'S ALSO PURPLE?

Yes, he looks nothing like the current mundo, but if you read mundo's lore or just think about his persona and you have to choose from the current champion pool then there is no doubt that this model is supposed to be mundo.
http://www.deerfenceny.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/2012OhDeer.BlogPic.jpg
{{champion:77}}
Cry in happiness I presume. So much better now :D
Remember when the nexus has 6 summoners around it? Then when riot visually updated the rift, they changed it to 4 . . . but there's always been 5 players.
no theres always 4 summoners and 1 feeder
The other 2 said "brb" but never came back :(

> [{quoted}](name=ZT Xperimentor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GnaOAIF4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-23T16:54:11.376+0000)
>
> Remember when the nexus has 6 summoners around it? Then when riot visually updated the rift, they changed it to 4 . . . but there's always been 5 players.

Indeed, my friend. I believe the 6th prior to the update was for minions, jungle monsters etc.  While the 5 were for champs.  4 makes no sense since as players we ARE THE SUMMONERS.  So I petition that at the start of every game one person should randomly be dropped on each team with a "Only 4 Summoners Aloowed" message or some such nonsense.
Perhaps that could work on a smaller map &/or in a unique gamemode; like a 5 minute round of something, then 30 seconds to switch out someone with the backup spectator, then another round, ext.

League was so much better in Beta...

jk lol i wasn't there
Who is next to Kassadin in that last one?

The "original" Dr. Mundo.
You can see it here http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/making-madman
That's Mundo... {{champion:36}}
Mundo x Singed?

nah that was fusioned  mundo and  singed 

then rito unfused them 
his name would be  sindo xD
dbz  reference xD

Good lord.
That can't be anymore than 15 polygons...
Rito league of legends legacy servers pls... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
What was good about that? Old client looks so awful üòÇ
Lmao, damn I havent seen that morg portrait in forever.. since her permabanned days haha
It's kind of odd how extremely crappy the graphics were back then. It was after all 2011, while League looked more like WoW in beta back in 2004 lol.
Low budget.
Wow, I'd forgotten how awful the game looked before.
Now you can show it to people without having to explain the crappy graphics :D
the old models are all hideous. I'm glad riot has updated.
Obligatory "When did X become more attractive than Y"
where is that lulu pic from?
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/20/Old_Minions.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110516051107
so... changes makes you cry? i have bad news for ya dude
